message.name: CRAFT_DISABLE_QTIP
message.value: Armory will be opened when you get {level} level

message.name: CONFIRMATION_COLLECT_FOR_RUBIES_TEXT
message.value: Are you sure, you want to buy this upgrade for rubies?

message.name: CONFIRMATION_COLLECT_TEXT
message.value: Are you sure, you want to make this upgrade?

message.name: REQUIRED_LEVEL_HINT
message.value: You need {level} level to make this upgrade

message.name: CONFIRMATION_DOWNGRADE_TEXT
message.value: You get 80% of the resources when you disassemble the weapon. Are you sure, you want to downgrade?

message.name: SEARCH_ZONE_GRADE_D
message.value: The best way to get it is to destroy the ground in missions, or to collect crates on low wagers.

message.name: SEARCH_ZONE_GRADE_C
message.value: Can be found in the ground in missions, drops from the sky on any wagers. There's good chance to get it as a reward for beating a boss.

message.name: SEARCH_ZONE_GRADE_B
message.value: Drops from the sky on high wagers, also can be got as a reward for a boss. There's a very small chance to get it in mission or on low wager.
